title: Travel
content: Our wedding venue is in Faithlegg County Waterford also known as the sunny south east. You can get to Waterford via the following routes;
âœˆï¸Manchester airport â¡ï¸ Dublin airport, 2 hour drive to Waterford from Dublin Airport
âœˆï¸Manchester airport â¡ï¸ Cork airport, 1 hour 45 drive to Waterford from Cork Airport
ğŸš¢Holyhead â¡ï¸ Dublin port, 2 hour drive to Waterford from Dublin port
ğŸš¢Pembroke â¡ï¸ Rosslare port, 50 min drive to Waterford from Rosslare
Hire car: We recommend booking hire cars through booking.com. We have used Dollar & Hertz for several trips and both were positive experiences.
Bus: If you prefer to not drive there are several bus (Bus Eireann/JJ Kavanagh) options from Dublin airport to Waterford. Bus route is 3 hours.
